summary: Completed comprehensive testing of combined role (SHIPPER_CARRIER) functionality. All features working correctly including checkbox-based role selection, dual role creation, and dashboard with both shipper and carrier actions.

design_issues.issue: Role summary text selector needed adjustment for testing, but display works correctly

passed_tests: Frontend checkbox role selection (both roles selectable)
Combined role summary display ('Shipper + Professional Carrier')
Dashboard with dual quick actions (New Request + New Offer)
Shipper functionality - Request creation form access
Carrier functionality - Offer creation form access
